web_tracking.measures package¶

Submodules¶

web_tracking.measures.entropy module¶

class web_tracking.measures.entropy.Entropy¶

Bases: web_tracking.measures.measurement.Measurement

Computes the various Entropy measures.

ENTROPY_OPTIONS = ('shannon', 'random')¶
calculate(df_input, **kwargs)¶

Computes the Random or Shannon Entropy on selected features.

df_input:

An input dataframe.

options: list

A list of entropy types, the random and shannon is selectable, and it takes both of them as default.

group: str

A column for grouping, it is ‘user’ as default.

features: list

A list of columns which the entropy is calculated with.

pandas.DataFrame

A dataframe with required entropy results.

web_tracking.measures.entropy.compute(df, features, options)¶
web_tracking.measures.entropy.get_entropy_func(opt)¶

web_tracking.measures.entropy_rate module¶

class web_tracking.measures.entropy_rate.EntropyRate¶

Bases: web_tracking.measures.measurement.Measurement

A measurement class for Lempel-Ziv Entropy computation.

calculate(df_input, **kwargs)¶

Computes the Lempel-Ziv Entropy on selected features.

df_input:

An input dataframe.

group: str

A column for grouping, it is ‘user’ as default.

features: list

A list of columns which the entropy is calculated with.

pandas.DataFrame

A dataframe with required entropy results.

web_tracking.measures.entropy_rate.compute(df, features)¶

Bases: abc.ABC, web_tracking.utils.validator.Validator

abstract calculate(df, **kwargs)¶

web_tracking.measures.predictability module¶

class web_tracking.measures.predictability.Predictability¶

Bases: web_tracking.measures.measurement.Measurement

Computes the predictability.

ENTROPY_OPTIONS = ('shannon', 'random', 'lz')¶
PE = {'pi_max': 'lz', 'pi_rand': 'random', 'pi_unc': 'shannon'}¶
PREDICTABILITY_OPTIONS = ('pi_unc', 'pi_rand', 'pi_max')¶
calculate(df, **kwargs)¶

Computes the Predictability on selected features.

df:

An input dataframe.

options: list

A list of predictability types, uncorrelated(pi_unc), random(pi_rand) and maximum(pi_max) predictability is selectable. All is enabled as default

features: list

A list of columns which the predictability is calculated with.

pandas.DataFrame

A dataframe with required predictability results.

web_tracking.measures.predictability.compute(df, features, options)¶
